Template.SubjectPart: It's back with a new season

Super Leigh is back with a new season - are you ready for it?

Hi {{username}},

Super Leigh is back with a new season - are you ready for it?

To start the new season {{home_team}} are playing {{away_team}} at {{ground}}.
The game kicks off at {{kickOff}} on {{date}}.
The round is now open so enter your prediction here: https://www.superleigh.co.uk/play/

Good luck for the new season !

The Super Leigh Team
